subject: Marathon Running
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The positive doping test by Jeptoo, a marathoner who won in Chicago on Oct. 12, was for the blood booster erythropoietin, Kenyan athletics officials said.
snippet: The positive doping test by Jeptoo, a marathoner who won in Chicago on Oct. 12, was for the blood booster erythropoietin, Kenyan athletics officials said.
